mentions.candidate: John Leech, the party's transport spokesman and MP for Manchester Withington, has claimed expenses for work done by the regional party – £4,000 – and also paid office rent to the branch.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Leaks reveal how the Lib Dem MPs were told to milk expenses to spend on propaganda.
mentions.partyLeader: Nick Clegg's claims to be the Mr Clean of politics.

issues.governance: MPs who put YOUR money into party coffers; MPs' EXPENSES LATEST; Leaks reveal how the Lib Dem MPs were told to milk expenses to spend on propaganda

leaflet.personalStatement: So much for cleaning up politics!

images.caption: Mr Clegg with John Leech, who has paid taxpayers' cash to his local party
